name: scalar-fastapi
description: FastAPI plugin to serve beautiful, interactive API documentation from OpenAPI/Swagger documents.
author: Scalar (https://github.com/scalar)

scripts.dev: command -v uvicorn >/dev/null 2>&1 && cd playground && uvicorn main:app --reload || echo '⚠️ uvicorn is not available, skipping the dev server.'
scripts.test: command -v python >/dev/null 2>&1 && python run_tests.py || echo '⚠️ python is not available, skipping the tests.'

readme.title: Scalar API Reference Plugin for FastAPI
